blogs.title: Effect of black Smook
blogs.content: Air pollution has significant effects on health, affecting nearly every organ system in the body. It is caused by a mix of pollutants, including particulate matter (PM), nitrogen oxides (NOx), sulfur dioxide (SO₂), carbon monoxide (CO), ozone (O₃), and volatile organic compounds (VOCs). Here's an overview of its impacts
